alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gadsden and southwestern Leon Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee Comm College, or 9 miles south of Midway, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Tallahassee, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Florida State University, Springsax Park, Lake Bradford, Lake Talquin, Leon Sinks, Andrew, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Bragg Stadium, Eight Mile Pond, Fort Braden, Tallahassee Coml Airport, Innovation Park, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Helen and Mission San Luis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
